name: Thousands of years from now
description:
The world a few thousand years from now  has been destroyed by humans.

As a self proclaimed Goddess revives you, set on a journey to save the world and humans from extermination.

This is a very small exploration/rpg game that can be completed in 20 minutes for the average player.

This game was made on RPG Maker MV on a dev time of 3+2 days. Originally made for a 72h Game Jam on the 24th of september then reworked for Hawktober on the 13th of october. Roughly 50 to 60 hours  of cumulative work.

The features that you can find in it are:

  • A small and simple main story;
  • The avatar choice;
  • The Enemies on the map;
  • An Improving Hud as the player unlocks features;
  • An Alternative leveling system for the player;
  • An Alternative/interactive leveling system for the npcs;
  • A Puzzle;
  • Etc...

The Minimum System Requirements for this game are:

  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) ;
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better;
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM ;
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU ;
  • Storage: 400 MB available space ;
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display.

This game also supports controllers and the Keyboard configuration can be changed in the options.
